alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 10 at 3:33PM EST until December 11 at 11:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Northwest Suffolk, Northeast Suffolk, Southwest Suffolk and Southeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In addition, a wet and saturated ground from heavy rainfall may result in some uprooting of trees.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk
